{xen:phrase install_update_explain, 'url={$updateData.resourceUrl}'}
{xen:phrase skip_this_update}

<xen:selectunit label="{$preparedOption.title}" name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}]" value="{$preparedOption.option_value}" hint="{$preparedOption.hint}" inputclass="{$preparedOption.inputClass}"> <xen:options source="$formatParams" /> <xen:explain>{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain}</xen:explain> <xen:html> <input type="hidden" name="{$listedFieldName}" value="{$preparedOption.option_id}" /> {xen:raw $editLink} </xen:html> </xen:selectunit>

{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain} :
{xen:raw $editLink}

<xen:textboxunit label="{$preparedOption.title}" type="password" autocomplete="off" name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}]" value="{$preparedOption.option_value}" hint="{$formatParams.hint}" placeholder="{$formatParams.placeholder}" size="{$formatParams.size}" maxlength="{$formatParams.maxlength}" rows="{$formatParams.rows}" inputclass="Elastic"> <xen:explain>{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain}</xen:explain> <xen:html> <xen:include template="option_list_option_editlink" /> <input type="hidden" name="{$listedFieldName}" value="{$preparedOption.option_id}" /> {xen:raw $editLink} </xen:html> </xen:textboxunit>

<xen:textboxunit label="{$preparedOption.title}" autocomplete="off" name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}]" value="{$preparedOption.option_value}" hint="{$formatParams.hint}" placeholder="{$formatParams.placeholder}" size="{$formatParams.size}" maxlength="{$formatParams.maxlength}" rows="{$formatParams.rows}" inputclass="Elastic"> <xen:explain>{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain}</xen:explain> <xen:html> <xen:include template="option_list_option_editlink" /> <input type="hidden" name="{$listedFieldName}" value="{$preparedOption.option_id}" /> {xen:raw $editLink} </xen:html> </xen:textboxunit>

modification.replace: <xen:if is="{$link.navigation_id} == 'UpdateCheck'"> <xen:if is="{$xenOptions.addoninstaller_check_update}"> <xen:set var="$updateCount"><xen:callback class="AddOnInstaller_Listener" method="getAddonInstallerUpdateCount" /></xen:set> <xen:else/> <xen:set var="$updateCount" /> </xen:if> <xen:set var="$link.title">{xen:phrase admin_navigation_UpdateCheck, 'updates={$updateCount}'}</xen:set> </xen:if> $1

code_events.event:
Called to fetch a list of supported add-on deployment methods.

Callback signature:

&$deployMethods

Arguments:

  1. array $deployMethods - an associative array of $methodId-$Class pairs.

To use this event properly, assign $deployMethods[$method] = $class'. Ensure the phrase "deployment_method_$method" exists.
This class MUST be defined as follows:

class My_Class_Name extends AddOnInstaller_Model_Deployment_Abstract
{
	// functionality to extend/override
}

Event Hint: Name of the class that is being loaded.

option.sub_options: host port username password passive timeout

phrases.phrase: Has errors - Check Server Error logs.
Add-on is fully up to date.
Option 1: I haven't yet downloaded the ZIP file. Get it for me.
Option 2: Install a ZIP or XML from the server:
Option 3: Upload a ZIP or XML file, or multiple files:

An unexpected error occurred while extracting add-ons. Make sure the install/addons directory exists and is writable. If it is, you may have some other permissions related problems that you should consult your host or server person about.
A valid and installable XML file has not been found. You must install manually.
Could not create temporary install directory. Please verify permissions are correct to write to the install/addons directory.

The details shown above are taken from the most recent update for this add-on in the Resource Manager.


If you would like to install this update, enter your XenForo username and password and it will be downloaded for you.


You should always check the Resource Manager page for the details of other updates.

To install an add-on, please choose one of the options below.

If the add-on is already installed it will be automatically upgraded for you.
Login to XenForo.com has failed. Make sure you login with your XenForo username and password.
No valid deployment method is set.
No download URL could be found at the provided Resource Manager URL. Is this a paid add-on?
No updates are configured for this add-on
There is no upload directory found within this archive. This add-on does not support the Add-on Installer.
Only proper Resource Manager URLs are valid

A comma delimited list of built-in deployment methods. Supported:
  1. copy
  2. fakeCopy
  3. ftp

Note; if no deployment methods are enabled, then the 'copy' deployment will be enabled.
'fakeCopy' is for testing deployment without copying files.
Please remember (much like your SMTP settings) no effort is made to encrypt this sensitive credential. It is stored in the database as plain text.
Please confirm that you want to rebuild add-on caches. This is a computationally expensive task and may impact board performance.

Please confirm below that you want to ignore this current update.

You may want to do this if the developer did not update the add-on XML file with the latest version and you have already installed this update.

You may also want to do this if the current update isn't required.

You will not be asked to update again until a new update has been released on the Resource Manager.
There has been a problem accessing the Resource Manager page.
Resource Manager URLs must be in this format: https://xenforo.com/community/resources/resource-name.1234/
You have already saved your XenForo username and password. If you wish to edit this, go to the External Service Providers options group.

You can click "Remember Me" to save your XenForo username and password in the database. This is done at your own risk. Please remember (much like your SMTP settings) no effort is made to encrypt this sensitive credential. It is stored in the database as plain text.
This add-on doesn't require an update
This add-on has no Resource Manager URL
Please enter the Resource Manager URL for this add-on.
The uploaded file is not a valid ZIP file.
The provided ZIP file could not be opened. Either the file is not a valid archive or some other read error occurred.
